function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High 𝑅 𝑡 leading to uncontrolled epidemic","Impact":"Increase in the number of infections and potential overwhelming of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement strict movement restrictions, case isolation, and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Healthcare tracking and monitoring systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Relaxation of control measures leading to virus spread","Impact":"Resurgence of case incidence and potential second wave of infections","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing, testing, and contact tracing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing kits","People":"General public, government authorities","Owner":"Health agencies, government"}]}
